answers.answer: I noticed that too, and on mobile app doesn't give options like Pinterest  I'd like to follow certain people and answer questions etc. What are some of your questions? Circumcision is not fun for mom doctor sent me on an errand :( abortion, disagree with, drugs I've seen people have kids taken away and dreams I want no part of lol, hope that helps!
Lol I feel the same way about my post!  I'm not really sure about an answer to ur question I just wanted to tell you good luck on Friday and let you know one of us out here is reading your post :)
Someone answered your last post, where you looking for another answer!?
The hospital should have kept you! My last pregnancy I had preeclampsia and they induced me right away in fear of me and the baby health. You should go to another hospital asap!!
Thank u ladies for all your sweet respones and oct3014 sorry for bothering u I hadnt seen the response yet. I have posted many serious questions & not gotten responses.  So thanks mamas & good luck
Bothering me? I was trying to figure out what u were looking for answer wise.
They should have kept you, i had preeclampsia as well and they induced me a couple days early beacuse of it. I was told that of bottom number gets to 105/106it could cause stroke.
Yes they should have kept you I delivered at 36w 2 times due to preclampsia

With my first born I developed preclampsia at32 weeks. I went in for a check up and they sent me straight to the hospital. It's dangerous for baby. I had a c-section that same night. You shouldn't have been sent home
I'm really surprised they didn't keep you... even if you weren't pregnant, they usually keep you with a high BP like that.  :/  Good luck!

I would go to another hospital and see if they will keep you, that is ridiculous and sounds like a lawsuit waiting to happen. They are putting you and the baby at unreasonable risk. I'm not for suing people but, that's just horrible. Good luck to you and prayers you al are healthy and safe.

question: apparently my post are never interesting enough to get a response but I got sent home from hospital for third time when the drs office sends me for high bp. I left yesterday with bp of 166/104.  Scheduled for c section friday when I turn 37 weeks due to preeclampsia.  Is it normal they sent me home no meds with bp that high. Oh & baby has been fine
title: circumcision, abortion, doing drugs, drama
